Detailed Description

Class representing a single coordinates.

This class represents coordinates on a board. It is used throughout the whole program. [-1,-1] are special coordinates standing for pass ( when meaning a move ) or a position outsite bounds of the board.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Coordinates ( string  sgf_coordinates_  ) 

constructor for transfer of string coordinates to coordinates

Parameters:
[in] sgf_coordinates_ This is a string representation of coordinates

This is a constructor creating instance of Coordinates class from string representing coordinates parsed from sgf.In sgf coordinates are saved like xy where xy are of values a - s, empty or tt means pass
